version_description:
Réduction des données échangées
Déclaration d'abus depuis un dialogue directement
Correction de bugs

• Simple and intuitive interface
• Improved performance for better speed use
• A new design to gain clarity

• Activate vibration mode for new messages
• Check the last visit of your favorite contacts
• Remember automatically of search criteria
• All search criteria are now on one single page
• Improved performance
• Bug fixes

• App available now in Spanish and Italian
• Improved performance
• Bug fixes

• The chat screen is now directly displayed for easy dating
• Improved performance
• Bug fixes

• Add pictures to your profile
• Change your VIP account's information from the "Settings" section
• Improved performance
• Bug fixes

• Add pictures to your private photo album
• Chat and share pictures
• Arabic version available

• Log in faster with Facebook Connect
• Enable notifications
• Improved performance

- Call the others connected users anonymously. Your mobile number will never be disclosed.
- Send all your messages as high priority.
- Receive message delivery and read reports.
- Chat without advertising

All the others features remain free, even for VIPs.

One again, we are totally engaged in 100% customer satisfaction with this new update !
For those who did not want to subscribe to the Premium Pack that offers maximum benefit, we decided to propose them as mini-subscriptions.
It is even possible to have free benefits after watching short videos of a few seconds.
Before new features unpublished, please appreciate this new update ...

2 more good news in this update.

1- "Followers" appear in the Contacts menu!
These are users who added you to their favorites.
Now you will know who likes you, it's your turn to like them!

2 - Fake profiles out of there!
The activation of your profile becomes mandatory after 3 connections.
We keep eliminating fake profiles, there are fewer and fewer but there are still some left.

Soon further improvements that will always meet your expectations.

Good chat!
